page.title: 11N. Bransholme, recreation.
page.content:
The schools are used in the evening and during the holidays for social events:- adult evening classes, cubs, scouts, rugby and football clubs, bingo session, and play centres.
Opposite Highlands school is a patch of waste ground left for the shopping presinct. Around this is a small park, Army Cadets and Youth club huts, shops, pub and, in amongst the houses, doctor's surgury. Across from this a day_centre for the old is nearing completion.
Close by the Dales is sheltered housing for the old.
The North estate has country-side to the East and West, providing an area for pleasant walks.
